bug.short_desc: [editor] org.eclipse.ui.PartInitException: Warning: Blocked recursive attempt by part org.eclipse.mylyn.tasks.ui.editors.task to dispose itself during creation

long_desc.thetext:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open 12 task editors 2. Open another editor
The task does not open but an exception is logged. The work-around is to close existing editors.
I saw this with Java 1.7 on Eclipse 3.7.2
Exception Stack Trace: org.eclipse.ui.PartInitException: Warning: Blocked recursive attempt by part org.eclipse.mylyn.tasks.ui.editors.task to dispose itself during creation at
